abstract: Configure capture formats and camera frame rates.
overview:
## Overview

The following code example illustrates how to select an iOS device’s highest possible frame rate:

Most common configurations of capture settings are available through the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession] object and its available presets. However, on iOS devices, some specialized options (such as high frame rate) require directly setting a capture format on an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance.
